Posts.Content: May 7, 2019 05:32AM Dalismom wrote: I was sent to a surgeon when my mammogram was abnormal for the biopsy, the surgeon actually performed the ultra sound biopsy and called me with the results. His office contacted the oncologist and made the appointment. I hope this helps a little, I know how sureal and scary a time this is. Hang in there, you are not alone.
Posts.Title: I'M BEING SENT TO A SURGEON BEFORE HAVING A BIOPSY Cdavis206 Tappermom383
